title: iGetter - Quick save Instagram
description:
It's time to forget about taking screen shot of every favorite post!
【iGetter】helps to download image and video from PUBLIC profile in fast and easy way.
【iGetter】supports loading multi images and videos in one post (Album / Gallery) !
【iGetter】Your favorite posts also be bookmarked for later checking.
▶  Cannot work with「PRIVATE」or「DIRECT」posts, will be error 103!
▶「NO LOGIN REQUIRED」
▶ STEPS TO USE
① On each post: copy share URL
② Open the【iGetter】, paste the URL and press download
③ Wait for just a seconds, then open video and enjoy!

developer_address: 111D Ly Chinh Thang, District 3, HoChiMinh city.
